Package org.jfree.chart.title

Class AttributedTextTitle

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.title.Title
org.jfree.chart.title.AttributedTextTitle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class AttributedTextTitle extends Title implements Serializable, Cloneable
A chart title that displays an attributed text string.
See Also:

    • arrangeNN

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeNN(Graphics2D g2, ArrangeParams params)
      Calculates the size of the title content (excludes margin, border and padding) if there is no constraint. This is either the natural size of the text, or the block size if this has been specified manually.
      Specified by:
      arrangeNN in class Title
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The layout result.

    • arrangeNF

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeNF(Graphics2D g2, double fixedHeight, ArrangeParams params)
      Arranges the block with no width constraint and a fixed height, returning the size of the content.
      Specified by:
      arrangeNF in class Title
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      fixedHeight - the fixed height.
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The layout result.

      Specified by:
      draw in interface Block
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      area - the area.
      params - if this is an instance of EntityBlockParams it is used to determine whether or not an EntityCollection is returned by this method.

    • drawHorizontal

      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      area - the area for the title.
